overview:
The unique mixture of technical skills and business sense of Atanas, combined with his in-depth knowledge of Internet technologies, visionary thinking and creativity made him the youngest Bulgarian web entrepreneur, launching his first web company at the age of 17.

Back in 1999 he started the knowledge sharing web service help.bg, some time before the same looking Yahoo! Answers emerged.

Atanas professional experience includes business consultancy at the French VC-funded IKALEO project (telecom) and managerial position at Bluvizia, an affiliate company of Icygen, where he was responsible for the companyâ€™s operations on the French speaking markets and for the launch of the Bluevizia global e-commerce platform.

People still remember 2 years ago as he declared loudly â€“ there is something broken in this web! What is the point of creating content at one place, consume it on another and interact on it elsewhere. As a result now people have a single place to do all possible things with the content of their interests - favit.

Always full of energy and optimism, he lives at work, starting every morning at 6 am. He copes with great hardships, thousands of comparisons and searching to offer the most user-friendly solution.
